rooms.description: Large entrance with ample natural light from large glass panels, oriented towards the east to invite positive energy according to Vastu principles.

Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side for excellent afternoon lighting and cross ventilation. Designed in a modern style with clean lines and minimalistic furniture placement.
Modern dining space adjoining the living room, featuring large glass doors that open to an outdoor patio area ensuring natural light and fresh air.

Contemporary kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows positioned on the south wall for balanced sunlight during morning hours. The layout includes an integrated pantry and dishwasher area, following efficient work triangle principles.
Compact guest bathroom located near the entrance to serve visitors, equipped with modern fixtures and natural light from a small skylight as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling glass door at the main entrance to welcome ample natural light into the living area.
Multiple side windows installed along the perimeter walls, ensuring cross ventilation and maximum sunlight throughout the day.
